about_the_game:
WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may complete it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can still support the project with a DLC. THANK YOU!

This DLC grants you lifetime access the following T0 equipment (pre-1940):
  • British expeditionary forces
    • British Hotchkiss 25mm AA Gun
  • US army
    • United States CA mle 38 25mm AA Gun
  • French army
    • French CA mle 38 25mm AA Gun
  • German army
    • German FlaK30 (20mm) AA Gun
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

Controls
detailed_description:
WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may complete it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can still support the project with a DLC. THANK YOU!

This DLC grants you lifetime access the following T0 equipment (pre-1940):

Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

Controls

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: Light AA Gun Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Gain access to the light anti-aircraft pack so you can spawn at mobile spawns, army bases and forward bases to attack enemy aircraft, trucks and infantry! These light AA guns can take down planes with accurately placed fire power. Deploy-able at mobile spawns!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
